verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> with a gold <S%G5554>ring,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2986>fine<s%> <S%G2066>clothing,<s%> <S%G1525>comes<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> a poor <S%G4434>man<s%> <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G4508>filthy<s%> <S%G2066>clothing<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> comes <S%G1722>in;<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> you pay special <S%G1914>attention<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G5409>wears<s%> the <S%G2986>fine<s%> <S%G2066>clothing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2521>"Sit<s%> <S%G4771><s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> in a good <S%G2573>place;<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> you <S%G2036>tell<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G2476>man,<s%> "Stand <S%G1563>there,<s%>" <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2521%G99999>"Sit<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5286>footstool;<s%>"

<S%G191>Listen,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%> <S%G1586><s%> <S%G3756>Didn't<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1586>choose<s%> those who are <S%G4434>poor<s%> in <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> to be <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G1861>promised<s%> to those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G846>him?<s%>

<S%G3305>However,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G5055>fulfill<s%> the <S%G937>royal<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture,<s%> "You shall <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4572>yourself,<s%>" you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3748>whoever<s%> <S%G5083>keeps<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> and <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G4417>stumbles<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1096>point,<s%> he has become <S%G1777>guilty<s%> of <S%G3956>all.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> he who <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3431>"Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery,<s%>" <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5407>"Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G5407>murder.<s%>" <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you do <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5407>murder,<s%> you have <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%> of the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> men who <S%G3195>are<s%> to be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> a <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1657>freedom.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> is without <S%G448>mercy<s%> to <S%G4160>him<s%> who has <S%G4160>shown<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1656>mercy.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1656>Mercy<s%> triumphs <S%G2620>over<s%> <S%G2920>judgment.<s%>

<S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G2036>tells<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5217>"Go<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G2328>be<s%> <S%G2328>warmed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5526>filled;<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> you <S%G3361>didn't<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> the things the <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G5101>needs,<s%> what good is <S%G3786>it?<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which <S%G1161>says,<s%> <S%G11>"Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it was <S%G3049>accounted<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>as<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> he was <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5384>friend<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

In the same <S%G3668>way,<s%> <S%G1344><s%> <S%G3756>wasn't<s%> <S%G4460>Rahab<s%> the <S%G4204>prostitute<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> in that she <S%G5264>received<s%> the <S%G32>messengers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1544>sent<s%> them <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3598>way?<s%>
